A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
So much Star Wars canon that has been trampled all over.

Humor is far too forced and doesn't belong\, feels like a Marvel movie.

Princess Leia flying like superman after been blown up\, dodging shrapnel\, going through decompression\, then tumbling through the vacuum of space was HILARIOUSLY bad.

Then there's how the entire premise of the movie\, the Resistance outrunning an Imperial fleet\, could have been instantly ended if the Empire just warped in some star destroyers or fighters to cut off the THREE remaining underpowered Rebel ships.

SO MANY PLOT HOLES AND IDIOTIC CHOICES.

As a hardcore Star Wars fan... man\, this hurts.
